articles.author: Erica Ayala
articles.title: 'We are better than what we showed': U.S. finds no silver lining in loss to Canada in women's worlds - The Athletic
articles.description: The Americans lost 5-1 to the Canadians, who were playing without Marie-Philip Poulin, and struggled in all phases.
articles.content: You wouldn’t know the United States was the defending World and Olympic champions after the first period of its match against Canada on Thursday night.“We had a slow start,” said USA captain Kendall … [+1453 chars]
